description: System-generated unique identifier for this record; used as the primary key.
Date-time the record was inserted or last modified, with millisecond precision. Time zone may be UTC; confirm with SME.
Code for a facility area identifying where assets, vehicles, or staff are located. Likely short codes; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the equivalent record in the legacy source system, enabling cross-reference and migration traceability.
Name of the table in the legacy source system from which this record originated.
